--- about: template: jolla id: about-block image: "img/my_image.jpg" links: - icon: twitter text: Twitter href: https://twitter.com/hheddeh - icon: github text: Github href: https://github.com/hhadah - icon: envelope text: Email href: "mailto:hussainhadah@gmail.com" --- ::: {#about-block} ::: # Welcome to my website! I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at the University of Houston. My research interest is in Applied Microeconomics primarily in labor economics. I research topics on discrimination, race, identity, mental health, and immigration. In my free time, I enjoy running with my two dogs, watching college and professional sports, and trying new restaurants in the Houston area.
